title: 7 places where Bollywood loves its actors to get ‘hot and sweaty’ that you should avoid doing so in real life
text: Rangoon 7 places where Bollywood… 7 places where Bollywood loves its actors to get ‘hot and sweaty’ that you should avoid doing so in real life Shahid Kapoor and Kangana Ranaut had been bombarded with questions of their lovemaking scenes in Rangoon, especially the one in the mud.
